languages.text: {n}Вскоре на Даргонус прибыл корабль, несший две дюжины астропатов. На поверхность они сошли, увешанные защитными амулетами, словно шли на войну — весть о трагедии, случившейся с предыдущим хором, быстро разнеслась по Простору.{/n}

{n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They descended to the surface covered head to toe in protective amulets as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that had befallen the previous Choir had quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вскоре на Даргонус прибыл корабль, несший две дюжины астропатов. На поверхность они сошли, увешанные защитными амулетами, словно шли на войну — весть о трагедии, случившейся с предыдущим хором, быстро разнеслась по Простору.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths had soon arrived on Dargonus. They have descended to the surface covered head to toe with protective amulets, as if they were going to war — the news of the tragedy that befell the previous choir have quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

{n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths had soon arrived on Dargonus. They have descended to the surface covered head to toe with protective amulets, as if they were going to war — the news of the tragedy that befell the previous choir have quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

{n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They have descended to the surface covered head to toe with protective amulets, as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that befell the previous Choir quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

{n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They have descended to the surface covered head to toe with protective amulets, as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that befell the previous Choir quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

{n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They descended to the surface covered head to toe in protective amulets as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that had befallen the previous Choir had quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

{n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They descended to the surface covered head to toe in protective amulets as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that had befallen the previous Choir had quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

{n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They descended to the surface covered head to toe in protective amulets as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that had befallen the previous Choir had quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一艘载着二十多名星语者的飞船很快抵达了达戈努斯。他们全身上下都佩戴着护身符，仿佛是要去打仗。显然，之前那些星语者的不幸遭遇早已传遍了整个科罗努斯扩区。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They descended to the surface covered head to toe in protective amulets as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that had befallen the previous Choir had quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一艘载着二十多名星语者的飞船很快抵达了达戈努斯。他们全身上下都佩戴着护身符，仿佛是要去打仗。显然，之前那些星语者的不幸遭遇早已传遍了整个科罗努斯扩区。{/n}
{n}一艘载着二十多名星语者的飞船很快抵达了达戈努斯。他们全身上下都佩戴着护身符，仿佛是要去打仗。显然，之前那些星语者的不幸遭遇早已传遍了整个科罗努斯扩区。{/n}

languages.text: {n}No tardó en llegar a Dargonus una nave con una veintena de Astrópatas. Descendieron a la superficie cubiertos de pies a cabeza con amuletos protectores, como si fueran a la guerra: la noticia de la tragedia que asoló el anterior Coro se había extendido rápidamente por toda la Extensión.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They descended to the surface covered head to toe in protective amulets as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that had befallen the previous Choir had quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No tardó en llegar a Dargonus una nave con una veintena de Astrópatas. Descendieron a la superficie cubiertos de pies a cabeza con amuletos protectores, como si fueran a la guerra: la noticia de la tragedia que asoló el anterior Coro se había extendido rápidamente por toda la Extensión.{/n}

languages.text: {n}間もなくすると20人余の感応通信官を乗せた船がダルゴナスに到着した。彼らは、戦場へ赴くかのように、頭からつま先まで護符で覆われた状態で地表に降りてきた...以前の聖歌隊を襲った悲劇のニュースは、瞬く間にエクスパンス中に広まった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They descended to the surface covered head to toe in protective amulets as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that had befallen the previous Choir had quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}間もなくすると20人余の感応通信官を乗せた船がダルゴナスに到着した。彼らは、戦場へ赴くかのように、頭からつま先まで護符で覆われた状態で地表に降りてきた...以前の聖歌隊を襲った悲劇のニュースは、瞬く間にエクスパンス中に広まった。{/n}
{n}間もなくすると20人余の感応通信官を乗せた船がダルゴナスに到着した。彼らは、戦場へ赴くかのように、頭からつま先まで護符で覆われた状態で地表に降りてきた...以前の聖歌隊を襲った悲劇のニュースは、瞬く間にエクスパンス中に広まった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un vaisseau transportant une vingtaine d'astropathes arrive bientôt sur Dargonus. Ils y débarquent, couverts d'amulettes protectrices de la tête aux pieds comme s'ils partaient en guerre. En effet, la nouvelle de la tragédie qui a frappé le chœur précédent s'est rapidement répandue dans toutes les Étendues.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They descended to the surface covered head to toe in protective amulets as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that had befallen the previous Choir had quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un vaisseau transportant une vingtaine d'astropathes arrive bientôt sur Dargonus. Ils y débarquent, couverts d'amulettes protectrices de la tête aux pieds comme s'ils partaient en guerre. En effet, la nouvelle de la tragédie qui a frappé le chœur précédent s'est rapidement répandue dans toutes les Étendues.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bald darauf traf ein Schiff mit zwei Dutzend Astropathen auf Dargonus ein. Sie betraten den Planeten von Kopf bis Fuß mit Schutzamuletten bedeckt, als würden sie in den Krieg ziehen ... die Nachricht von der Tragödie, die den vorherigen Chor befallen hatte, verbreitete sich in der Ausdehnung wie ein Lauffeuer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They descended to the surface covered head to toe in protective amulets as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that had befallen the previous Choir had quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bald darauf traf ein Schiff mit zwei Dutzend Astropathen auf Dargonus ein. Sie betraten den Planeten von Kopf bis Fuß mit Schutzamuletten bedeckt, als würden sie in den Krieg ziehen ... die Nachricht von der Tragödie, die den vorherigen Chor befallen hatte, verbreitete sich in der Ausdehnung wie ein Lauffeuer.{/n}

{n}Bald darauf traf ein Schiff mit zwei Dutzend Astropathen auf Dargonus ein. Sie kamen von Kopf bis Fuß mit Schutzamuletten bedeckt auf die Oberfläche hinab, als würden sie in den Krieg ziehen — die Kunde von der Tragödie, die den vorherigen Chor befallen hatte, hat sich in der Ausdehnung rasant verbreitet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İki düzine Astropat taşıyan bir gemi, kısa süre içinde Dargonus'a vardı. Tepeden tırnağa koruyucu uğurluklar kuşanmış bir hâlde, âdeta savaşa gidercesine yüzeye ayak bastılar. Kendilerinden önceki Koro'nun başına gelen trajediye dair haberler, Enginlik'in dört bir yanında süratle yayıldı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A ship carrying two dozen Astropaths soon arrived on Dargonus. They descended to the surface covered head to toe in protective amulets as if going to war — the news of the tragedy that had befallen the previous Choir had quickly spread throughout the Expanse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İki düzine Astropat taşıyan bir gemi, kısa süre içinde Dargonus'a vardı. Tepeden tırnağa koruyucu uğurluklar kuşanmış bir hâlde, âdeta savaşa gidercesine yüzeye ayak bastılar. Kendilerinden önceki Koro'nun başına gelen trajediye dair haberler, Enginlik'in dört bir yanında süratle yayıldı.{/n}
